description: Destruction of property, East Washington Street. Shooting into occupied dwelling, East Washington Street. Vandalism of private property, Pruden Boulevard.
text:
The following information comes directly from the City of Suffolk Department
of Media and Community Relations. It should be noted that a criminal charge is
only an accusation and does not indicate a conviction has or will be attained
nor that the party listed in the arrest report is guilty of the crime listed.

May 29

Incidents

Petit larceny, Charlotte Avenue

Destruction of property, East Washington Street

Street
